Feb. 20, 1983 D Oldham Contest (Championship and Section 2)
Oldham Contest (Championship and Section 2) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest

Queen Elizabeth Hall, Oldham, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes - 1st £150 and cup, 2nd £120 and cup, 3rd £90. 12th annual contest. 7 bands competed.
